issue.title: [CF 827] Tracking Shield Block recharge Timer
issue.body:
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SShield~`Block ^SManaCheck^B ^SPBarOffs^S0 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowPBar^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SUnAlpha^N0.6 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N62102^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. I create a Shield Block cooldown icon
2. I have OmniCC on
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I was expecting to have the CD displayed as text like it happens on Taunt, for example. Instead, it doesn't show the cd, only the rage necessary to use the spell, which I have also configured.
Is it because Shield Block has a Recharge of 9s instead of a cd? How to I track this type of spell?

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.2.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No


> Posted by CurseForge user Zhurk | Imported from CurseForge issue #827 | Raw

comments.body:
Timers are not shown for abilities unless all their charges have been consumed. The same behavior can be observed by looking at the ability on your action bars.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
